name: Blood Moon Rising (Raptor Studios)
description:
In Blood Moon Rising you play as Count Dracula in your quest to conquer a castle.

  • Explore the castle from a top-down perspective
  • Fight guards with your blood powers - either heal or deal extreme damage
  • Level up to defeat guards more swiftly

Use arrow keys and mouse to control the game

Blood Moon Rising was made for Mini-Jam 118
